law.text: The following words as used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires, shall have the following meanings: “Board of aldermen” or “selectmen” includes the board or other authority exercising the powers of a board of aldermen or of selectmen; but nothing herein shall be construed as affecting the veto power of a mayor of any city. “Department”, the department of public utilities. “Public way”, any way laid out by public authority. “Railroad”, a railroad or railway of the class usually operated by steam power. “Railroad corporation”, the corporation which lays out, constructs, maintains or operates a railroad of the class usually operated by steam power. “Railroads and railways”, all railroads and railways except tramways in mines and marine railways.
